language.entry: Magician

Straight forward in battle and personality, The Magician's scuffed and black cloak is both heavy enough for grazing blows and yet light enough to not slow down her relentless march forward in combat. This made all the more complete by her imposing hat. Mundane in nature, one can't help but feel a sort of magic when witnessing it.

Believing power is key, The Magician arms herself with a mini-hakkero capable of storing magical energies to fuel it's own white-hot burning magic. Should things not go as planned, The Magician brings both her talents in more earthly witchcraft to bolster or patch up her companions, or her faithful broom to sweep the opposition back into place.

Restless as ever, The Magician keeps her hands busy. Whether in the practice of witchcraft and mycology or in the business of others, The Magician is sure to have what you're looking for at short notice.

Brew 1 Magician Bomb Tincture.
Borrow 2 unique provisionals at random.
Forage 2 random mushrooms.
Magician Bomb Elixir

Drink to {colour_start|notable}set{colour_end} your {colour_start|attacktype}Spell Card{colour_end} limit to {colour_start|notable}3{colour_end}! {colour_start|skill_unselectable}Dislcaimer: Has no effect on non-magicians.{colour_end}
Magician Bomb Tincture

{colour_start|notable}Increases{colour_end} your {colour_start|attacktype}Spell Card{colour_end} limit by {colour_start|notable}1{colour_end}! {colour_start|skill_unselectable}Dislcaimer: Has no effect on non-magicians.{colour_end}
Hourai Green-button
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end}: 2, {colour_start|healhp}Regen{colour_end} 2/1 {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"I wonder how this got here? Did it take a carriage like I did?"{colour_end}
Hourai Green-button

Confusing Remedy
Clear {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end}; -30 Stress {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"C'mon, he wasn't ever gonna use it!"{colour_end}
Old man's playbook
+15%% DMG & +15%% PROT for 4 battles {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Hehe, this is kinda' like danmaku for the slow minded."{colour_end}
Leftover Treats
-20%% Party Surprise Chance & +20%% Monster Surprise Chance for 4 battles {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Not for human consumption, but times are rough."{colour_end}
Zealous Water
Heal 15 Stress and remove Mortality Debuff {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Never had a potion you threw on yourself instead of drinkin'"{colour_end}
Experimental Cure
{colour_start|healhp}Heal:{colour_end} +50%%; +33%% Healing Received for 4 battles {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"I'm probably dyin' already if I need to drink this, so bottoms up, ze"{colour_end}
Twice Taken Knife
{colour_start|stealth}Stealth{colour_end}, +20%% DMG; +4%% CRT for 2 rounds {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Taking her shovel would've been more trouble than it's worth, ze"{colour_end}
Bloody Whetstone
+10%% CRIT for 4 battles {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Maintaining a sharp broom preserves a sharp mind."{colour_end}
Scarlet Tea Leaves
-20%% Stress Received for 4 battle {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Smells a bit like copper and old clothes."{colour_end}
Misplaced Donations
Mon from an unfortunate shrine, worth 3500 gold {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"I'll pay her back... eventually."{colour_end}
Unusual Urn
Petite Crystal
+20%% Max HP; +30%% Damage Reflect for 4 Battles {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"It was far too pretty to just leave it there."{colour_end}
Discounted Orange
-10%% Crit Received; +20%% Disease Resistance {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"How's he even gonna' eat this anyways?"{colour_end}
Short Fused Bomb
+40%% DMG and +100%% Random Target Chance for 1 rd. {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"This is the real deal, 'aint it?"{colour_end}
Haunting Snacks
+15 Dodge and +5 SPD for 3 rds. {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"These things make me uneasy, oh well."{colour_end}
Lightly Used Components
Inflicts 4 stress; +6%% CRT and +25%% Debuff Resistance if torchlight is less than 50 for 1 battle. {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"Witches oughta' share, right?"{colour_end}
Intriguing Notes
+50%% Resolve EXP at end of the dungeon. {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"I gotta remember which library I took this from."{colour_end}
Secondary Aid

Heal 2 HP, cure bleed; +40% Bleed Resistance and +10% Healing received for 3 rds. {colour_start|skill_unselectable}"I aint in the wrong if she's the one keepin' all the bandages to herself, ze"{colour_end}
Replace me!
Replace me!
Apprentice Wand
Mushroom Manual
Borrower's Bag
Staff of Vengeful Spirits
"I'm going to Alice"
Sure you can keep up?
It fell off the back of a wagon
They can have it back when I'm dead, ze.
Huh? How'd this get here?
Hey, I don't judge what you drink.
These ones aren't poisonous, I think?
Couple of these'll do ya good.
One makes you larger, the other makers you small.
Hold still will ya?
I get ya good as new, ze.
Just a quick patch job, ze
Woah, you really want to use this skill?
Oh me? I'm the Miko!
Not even breakin' a sweat, ze.
Next.
Got any more fight in ya?
It's not over already, is it?
That was no ordinary hit, though!
Ha! Try and keep up with me.
Get back up so I can hit you again.
Extermination's just that easy, ze.
At this pace we'll have time for drinks after.
What a bore you turned out to be.
Watch your heads!
Pretty good spell, right?
Outta' my way!
Gets the blood flowin'.
If you want revenge, the name's Reimu Hakurei!
This night won't go as you expect!
Neat trick, but I know better!
Woah, hey! Let go!
Spooky stuff, mind if I borrow that spell?
I knew you guys were behind this incident!
Ehh.. my head...
So I get to keep these shells, right?
Did the fumes get to me again?
Whoops. You guys can forgive me, right?
That was the worst trip of my life.
Come on, it's just a trick.
Who wants to swap places??
You're a terrible dungeon master, you know?
What, you see something good?
what's the hold up?
Onwards!
No use stickin' around here.
How about a song while we march?
Eh? Did you notice something?
I might have some extra torches.
Did it just get a little darker?
You didn't cheap out on us, did ya?
I can make this work, ze.
Hey boss, the light.
Wait, wait! I see a sparkle of something in the distance!
What? Am I supposed to use my spells to see where I'm going?
More treasure right?
What'd I do to you?!
Hey, hey! You're mistaking me for someone else!
Enh.. Now things are heatin' up.
(spits) That the best ya' got?!
Not the face!
uhhhn. I'm getting tired...
Anyone got a bandage?!
Let me patch this wound up first!
Oh, I'm feelin' dizzy...
Where is it? I have something for this! Where is it?!
(grunts) That's not a good burn...
Hold on! That wounds nothin' I can't fix, ze!
Woah! I mean, you're gonna' be alright!
THAT'S CHEATING!
I'M SORRY!
WHO DID THIS?
IT'S ONLY FAIR!
ALL OF YOU, DE-
I'M GOING TO ALICE!
I'VE FAILED AGAIN!
NOT AGAIN!
It can't be the last adventure...
Sorry, friend...
There goes the good ending...
...How about we try that again, ze?
...Another chance, don't squander it!
...Did I have you worried there?
Back on your feet, this night isn't over!
Don't delay! Give as you've gotten!
Ugh, my head...
This place is getting on my nerves.
Enough!
How much more of this?
Can we pick up the pace?!
Maaaaster Spark!
Final Spark!
(wipes hands) They're not recoverin' from that!
Hah! Leave nothing left.
Spark and burn it all down!
Not bad, but let me show you how to clear a room!
Tag me in!
Flashy! Not much power behind it though...
Don't waste time! Just wipe them out next time!
Annnd then enters the Magician!
(You sure you're not a witch too?)
(Tricks are no substitue for raw power!)
(Stalling for time as usual?)
(Eh? Did you do something?)
(I'm surprised you didn't blink out of here, heh.)
I can hold more than I look!
Ah, a reward to myself!
Buy a round for everyone, but bring them all to me. Alright?
You should be payin' me.
Eh, you'll do.
I got some talents as well, ze.
How do I play this? I want to play this.
I take all in everything I do.
Clear a seat for me, or I will!
This is so boring....
Do I have to?
How long do I have to stay here?
How's this not just more sinning?!
This is like a kinkier brothel, yeah?
I want the cute one to do it for me.
Don't expect any donations from me.
This place looks as shoddy as Miko's shrine.
I-I'm not gonna burst into flames when I walk in, right?!
So are we burnin' up some bad guys or what?
Guess I got more time to read sittin' here.
Come on, there has to be some interesting stuff down there!
This kinda work is no sweat, ze.
I'm not ready to give up now.
Just let me take something before the show.
Maybe just let me lay down for a bit?
Ask the lazy one in red, not me!
I can't enjoy my loot if I have no time to admire it!
Please, I need some time alone.
This incident is madness!
I'd rather take my chances with the fiends than stay here.
Is it really any safer up here?
Taking me would only be a mistake.
Just leave me alone.
You're mistaken if you think you've earned my loyalty.
Don't approach me until you've raised the tavern's betting limit.
Do not even think of sending me back with that last team.
May I cull the heard?
I have more to give, send me back.
I wonder how many I can take with me.
The flowers refuse to grow here...
Don't take me from the moon's alluring gaze.
(hic) C'mon, I didn't tell ya' to stop.
I (hic) used to drink with oni, you know?
Hey, want to see a magic trick?
Hold still, or this'll burn!
One more try, I can win this time.
Hey, not like it's my money I lost...
Can I go now? Please?
C'mon let me out of here!
So do I pretend to pray before or after the kneeling?
That looks expensive.
What was my safe word again?
How's any of this have anything to do with the light?
Please don't tell me there's a secret monster after this.
I just need a few more mushrooms, that'll fix me up...
Maybe I could use a long sleep...
I need to just be happy I made it out.
So... if this is all just a loop, how's there a sequel?
Do all of you want to be exterminated, perhaps?
Have any of you even thought about not getting hit?!
The first one to run will recieve a knife in their back.
Uncouth, unwashed, uneducated.. I should have all of you expelled from the hamlet.
Perhaps I should test my blade on one of you first?
The least any of you could do is retrieve my knives for me.
If you don't keep your heads down, I am not to blame if you catch a blade.
How best to prepare one of you, I wonder.
You sure make a lot of noise for someone who's dead.
If my knife ricochets, none of you will be left.
I've heard quite enough.
I said to keep your head down.
I can't afford to waste time in a place like this.
I feel like cutting something, such as a neck.
Should I join in your loud signalling of the enemy?
You're toying with them a little too much.
That was only a graze.
That was pitiful.
You seem to have few worries. Isn't that nice.
As punishment, go retrieve my knives.
Don't slack off. Unlike myself, you have limited time.
I think not.
Hmpf, presumptuous to think you'd do better here.
All of you are not even worthy to be food.
I haven't the time.
You're all very cunning, do it yourselves.
We have quite enough useless knowledge already. We don't need any more.
Right, I'm sure you're an expert.
Did I even once say that I was weak?
I've forgotten the meaning of my weapons..
I am unable to escape from who I am, a most detested being.
I should have never left her side.
It's as if the world has come to a complete halt...
Forgive me, Mistress...
She smiled so cruelly...
No matter how much I wish, time will not rewind.
We are nothing more than rusted knives. Used and discarded.
Here, allow me to make things easier.
Go on, I would do the same to you.
I have only been delaying the inevitable.
But if I fall here.. Then...
What use could I be?
Hesitation over comes me once more.
Futility, it's all that is.
Leave me be.
What happens to the dead if they starve themselves to death?
Food will only bring back memories.
There’s no point to seeking meaning in these deeds I've carried out.
What time is left is my own to spend.
My will is not my own, nor yours.
Humans don't become monsters, they just act like them.
The Manor had few windows, but even it is better than this...
Rotting away, warping time and space...
I, too, am fleeting.
I have already failed her, There is no reason to continue.
A knife has no humane blood in its body, you know. I'm such a one.
I'll kill this cold heart myself.
My burnt-up hope longs for the end.
Leaving is what lead me to this fate.
No thank you.
And not a difference would it make.
Save your pity for the others.
No, this incident is already at it's end for me..
I am beyond such things now.
(Stares)
I'm sorry, I don't feel well.
I will only fail you too.
A failure does not deserve such things.
This can not bring me comfort.
Me? No, you're mistaken.
You mock me with this false hope.
Amusing, but no.
More tricks will not make up for the ones which failed.
I’m shaking in my heart, all but breaking...
The Mistress would be angry with me!!
We've gone so far by now, but... I can't see an end to this!
No matter how many times they're defeated, they won't die.
I-I have to go retrieve my knives...
What..? How did I end up here? Move. Move out of my way!
They're too close, I have no time to react!
Our sins are calling to us.
Look, the strange energies are getting stronger even now....
I wonder, can my knives even cut phantoms?!
I'm not sure I'm qualified.
(What am I even trying to accomplish here?)
What? Why is time resuming..
If that bug we saw before shows up again...
Twisting away, mixing time and space...
How have we passed so many nights this way?
Everything comes to a halt...
Their attacks are too unpredictable!
Huh!? Who was that? They came out of nowhere!
(heavy breathing)A graze...just a graze...
How troublesome...
Why are you stalling this fight?!
Perhaps you should become more aware of your surroundings?!
We are no more than dominos now.
That was far too close. Pay attention!
Luck shall take us only so far.
I-I don't understand..
Why am only I frozen in place..
I didn't want to come here.
Lingering here is a fatal mistake.
They wait just outside the boundry of our light, all of you are fools.
With so many blooming, bamboo flowers shall be dinner tonight.
They scatter and bloom, then scatter and bloom again....
My memories become a haze, just who am I?
Ahhh, such a sight, and yet their blossom is so fleating...
They mock us from above, those upon the moon.
You're getting in the way of my cleaning again...
Oh... Certain were my beliefs that this place would be filled with flowers, as well.
Hm? Are there flowers here as well?
No flowers are in bloom. Time to depart.
Wherever I find myself, flowers can be found all around.
Will there ever be a place for the broken in the light?
Mistress? I will be there shortly!
Oh, it's so much warmer in the sky. It's so wonderful that I could cry...
You can hear them, can't you? The moon rabbits.
Even if there are flowers, they cannot be seen.
More people have said that and been killed by me than there are thorium decay products.
You sing unusual songs.
(Humming)
(Ah, I only meant that as a joke...)
Tonight's dinner shall be... You!
It's still a bit early for a meal, isn't it?
Humans taste not with their tongues, but with their minds.
You! You wish to harm the Mistress, don't you?!.
If all that I do is fly in circles, I will never find my destination!
Are you the cause of these flowers?!
The carrot I found the other day was a rare one. When I uprooted it, it let out a sad cry.
Which of you shall be our Tea, this night?
(laughs) Mistress, did you see what- Oh...
I cannot allow you to see the Mistress!
Slow and predictable, thats all your attacks are.
Ah, it's an illusion.
GRAZE!!!!
No! You trodded upon the flowers!
Why must you make so much more work for me?!
Please watch your step, you nearly crushed a flower.
If you had stepped upon the flowers...(shivers)
Would you two please take this else where?
I've dodged yet another pitiful attack!
Hmm? I do not wish to depart yet.
I'm sorry, but the Mistress is not accepting visitors.
(Throws it) Oh, wait..
Thank you, but I have plenty.
(laughs softly) As if they landed any blows.
But the Mistress needs it more! Please heal her in my stead.
The librarian will take care of my wounds, please do not worry.
(Dodge!)
I refuse to gaze into your torch of madness.
Would you see yourself out?
Oh, today's red tea... Did it not please you?
I am sorry, but I must tend to the Mistress.
Please ask one of the other magicians, I am terribly busy.
Oh my, hold on, the tea is about to boil.
I am terribly busy, please come back sooner.
Myself will do if none can be found.
Mistress, are you thirsty?
Such course of action is unbecoming.
I will not abandon the Mistress!
And who do you expect to clean this up?!
Tis but a graze.
You can drink their blood as much as you want!
You musn't let it spill.
Let the Sanzu grow ever wider!
I awaken to a world of red!
Purge this sinful scarlet, so I may return to who I used to be.
My senses have bloomed and are twisting and turning.
Every scar is yet more proof of my devotion.
Allow me to distract them, the rest of you should flee.
Do not stand in the way of my devotion.
I wish to bleed for the Mistress.
Fiends, let us become a beautiful scarlet together.
Pain? Agony? Doesn't matter in such a place.
Strike me already, remind me of my humanity.
No wrong, no right. Just sick delight.
Knives will rain upon us both!
Bask in my bloody devotion!
I couldn't eat another bite.
I seek other methods of fulfilment.
Stain my body, twisted, beautifully, in scarlet.
Do your worst, there is nothing I would not endure for her.
The Mistress would be upset if I didn't waste your best efforts.
I slice the bread. And I feed myself again.
I’ll decorate with the beautiful colour everyone hides within.
Go ahead, leave, but I have no such plans.
And dishonor the Mistress? (scoff)
You should thank me for this privilege.
I thought such horrors could hit harder than that.
Should have killed me, its my turn isn't it?
But I wasn't even moving.
I, for one, would like to give it a try.
It wouldn’t hurt you to feel some pain from time to time would it?
Oh, but I'm in "Push Forward" mode right now.
Move aside? You'll have to make me.
I can clean up after myself, thank you.
It can wait, the Mistress' honor is at stake.
Truly, they are more in need of mercy than myself.
I am closer to her like this.
None of that, the pain keeps me focused.
This task is mine alone.
To ease my burdens would be to admit defeat.
Accepting aid would have bored the Mistress.
Sure, if you don't mind poison in the tea.
Leave me to my suffering and I'll leave you to yours.
I have a better idea, spread your fingers out on this stump.
I'm having far too much fun.
She loved when I looked this way.
What do you plan to steal from me next?
The one who hurt me is only myself..
I have no need for such a thing as a restful place.
Mistress. Are you watching?
I feel there's something extremely strange going on...
There is another incident approaching...
I shall cut down your shameless eyes!
Enough of this troupe, I can only rely on the knife in my hand.
Humans are a detestable lot..
Perhaps something suspicious can be found here.
This is dangerous... I shall depart with all due haste.
I will not be dying for your kind.
This strange feeling. There must be someone else here.
There is always something far stronger behind the scenes.
(muttering)Should waste them all to be safe.
Is that so?
And of course your plan is as flawless as the last.
(Stares)
Whatever, stop the bad things and lies, now.
I reject my humanity!
I don't know what's happening...but I'm very angry.
I will not let you tell lies now.
You won't be backstabbing me first.
You wish to poison my tea as well?
I'd rather not share a meal with humans.
...How can any one be so perfectly fine amidst this poison?
Sleep well...
My chances might fair better with them, than present company.
Ah! You! Cease distracting me, or is that your plan?
I'll exterminate everyone here before they can finish me.
They seek to box me in.
Would seem your plot to have me killed has failed.
They say that if there's a bad smell, clean up its source. I'm good at cleaning.
Missing on purpose, or was it human incompitence?
(laughs) Is something backfiring?
Serves you right.
It's definitely you. I thought so from the beginning.
Bribing them? Here I thought you looked too poor.
I know there is a gap in their attack here, nice try.
We're allies of convenience, guess what this is not.
This is all your doing, isn't it?
Who would accept that?
Wait, you're very suspicious.
That's too unrealistic even for a lie.
It is just such statements that raise suspicion!
What a childish lie.
Are you sure you're not causing any mischief?
I'll do well without sabotage, thank you.
Mingle with humans? I must decline.
I don't think I want anything to do with you.
I'll get to distracting myself right away.
You're always planning something bad, aren't you? Every day and night.
Anyone who plans something bad will also tell lies!
You think I can't feel your hate for me?
Is this incident your doing, perhaps?
I didn't come here just to be sent back.
The patterns.. are so pretty!
Patterns swirl, colors over taking the senses...
Sleep? Yet I see them! Just beyond the boundries.
The moon grieves, this night.
The eye, I see it too now.
DO NOT TOUCH THE EDGE!
Mirrors within mirrors!
The pattern tightens around me!
My rainbow misses something still...
My senses are overwhelmed!
Where are you hiding?!
The colors draw me in! See how they spin!
Every shade draws near, yet not one can touch me.
The patterns are gathering, if I move...
White flowers... left and forgotten...
Colors form a path, I've no choice but to follow.
The madness is taking over...
Who is it that reflects in your eyes?
She calls to me, your colors must spill over!
Red. RED!
My favorite shade of scarlet.
I shine a gorgeous hue for her!
I scream out, yet she doesn't hear me.
Make this match a good match for me.
Can she see me now, as I see her?
The second hand begins to move again...
A phantom breaks through the patterns!
Spiralling, spinning, the colors deceive me.
Shine ever brighter so she may see us!
The hour hand passes you by.
Malicious patterns find their mark.
A rondo of life, coming to its end.
You strike whats before you, neglecting the patterns closing in!
Even now the colors form the only path we may take!
They're mine to offer up to her!
To see so much with these empty eyes...
Bound in motion to the pattern's will.
This is a place we can never leave.
Any clue, any at all will do.
Where could she have gone?
Please, hide and seek is over now...
Blinded, we suffer such a clumsy device.
Falling for such an obvious thing, pitiful
I couldn't...
Not while they're watching.
It's not food that I see.
THE NIGHTMARE IS ENDLESS!!!
PLEASE HEAR ME!!!!
ALL UNWINDS!!!
You're standing in my light.
Do not distract me, the patterns must always be watched.
If you haven't seen her, away with you.
No, I need my strength to spot her glow.
All the colors have gathered, but one, it must be found.
Flashing, darting, swarming, converging...
You'll only dull my glow.
My wounds are a beacon.
I guess I should praise you for what you do understand. This isn't one of them, however.
Your time would be better spent observing!
And why do you deserve my attention?
Oaf! You'll cross with the patterns!
I am as she desires.
No more talk of this.
My radiant pain is a signal in the darkness.
Crystals, where are they?! She desires them!
It must be in here somewhere.. crystals will call to her.
Please, let me search for her.
What was once black has become a cacophony of hues.
I never had the choice of becoming your ally from the start.
Even shares, yet uneven burdens. How typical.
I'm here for the Mistress' sake, not yours.
Rest of you are closer to obstacles than allies.
Shouldn't the reward be per-kill?
I feel like I'm just wasting my time here...
Each of you need to learn their place.
I fight for the Mistress, the rest of you are on your own.
No longer will I allow anyone to get in my way.
Let me pass through, will you?!
Oh heroic meat-shield.. You're blocking all of my shots.
(sighs) Be of use for once, would you?
Not worth wasting the life.
Don't give me that look, you should be used to this.
(Stares Coldly)
Sure, I'll consider it.
And end things so soon? I'm going for more points from the Mistress.
I said I don't care.
Sadly, our plans do not coincide.
Observe. Perfection and elegance.
It would be amusing to see you prove I took anything.
The Mistress' need is greater, these precious things should go to me.
Me? The thief? How novel.
Absorbing blows is my job now, too?
All of you are paying for that one.
There's no need to be proud and noble at a time like this.
I'll correct your swing for the next one too.
If you're going to get in my way, atleast make it worth it to me.
I'm convinced, you do deserve an equal share.
Unfortunately for you, I have no intention to support dead weight of any kind.
I need to conserve myself for the Mistress.
Never was one for donations.
No matter what happens, there's always a path to follow.
To become a foe of mine is no different than to abandon your life.
I will help you no matter what the situation. Please rely on me.
Come now, get back to work.
Do you think you can escape from my knives?
I wish to test how keen the edge of this knife is.
This kind of barrier is simple to bypass.
Now, let's finish this before dawn comes.
No one can escape my knives.
Your blood will coat my knife.
We have no more need for forbearance.
Would you like to test that claim that we're powerless?
I will let my blades dance for my Mistress.
Let's dye everything scarlet.
There’s nothing that will wound this body of mine.
No matter how much it cuts, this blade does not grow dull!
The candle of my soul will not be extinguished!
I'm feeling sharper than ever, disappointed?
The phantom of knives is not so easily deterred.
I feel not one whit of fatigue.
Time has no dominion here.
Freed from the trappings of their humanity, they plied their terrible trade anew.
The gibbous moon revealed her inhuman desires in their stultifying hideousness.
Well, this is compromising...
My thanks, allow me to help rid you of these blood suckers.
IT DRAWS ME CLOSER
It's intoxicating..
WASTE NOT A DROP!
(grunting) KEEP AWAY FROM ME!
MESMERISING! GUSHING!
I can't look away.
Cover the wound, I can.. smell it.
(heavy breathing) Please, treat it quickly.
Let me investigate this.
Maybe there's.. hold a moment, everyone.
I can't fight it, please be in here...
Keep away from me, let me look for it in peace.
I-I'm sorry, this isn't like me.
How could I be so distracted...
And yet I subsist..
My balance is leaving me...
ENTHRALLING CRIMSON!
MY EYES, THEY SHINE LIKE HERS!
WHY CONTAIN IT?!
FOR THE MISTRESS, I CARVE THROUGH THEM ALL!
My existance is a travesty....
I thought myself unable to get any lower...
Even the slighest relief...
Don't come near me right now!
Are you daft?! Stay back.
This feeling, so exhilarating!
Was this how she always felt?
I am in control of this...
She never wanted this for me!
See? I'm in complete control.
Such an intense rush! I could exterminate them all!
The hunger gnaws at my mind!
The pangs are becoming difficult to subdue...
This is a detestable way to live...
Tonight's dinner, IS YOU!
THESE FOUL IMPULSES!
You got to close! It's your own fault!
I'm trying to resists, but this scent!
Don't just let me die like this!
BLEED! AND REVEL IN SCARLET!
THE LAST OF MY HUMANITY IS SHED AT LAST!
MY LIFE FOR THE MISTRESS!
Control is waning...
Cease taunting me with your wounds.
Maybe it better I waste away than feed...
Concentration is becoming.. taxing..
DO NOT INTERFERE!
I'VE REACHED A PEAK I NOT THOUGHT POSSIBLE!
I AM ABOVE YOUR TRIVIALITIES!
Keep away, you idiot!
This won't help me maintain control!
Let me give in or let me die, I care not for anything else.
You're wasting your time.
This curse has ruined my appetite.
This hunger isn't satiated by simple food.
Don't get within arms reach....
You're mocking me...
WHAT A FOOLISH ORDER!
WHEN ALL THE WORLD IS RED? (laughs)
I WILL TAKE WHAT I NEED FROM THEM!
NONE WILL EVEN LAND A BLOW!
But can you cure me of this curse?!
Pointless.
What do you wager I will actually perish from?
Please, let me rest a little longer...
I haven't.. the energy, I'm sorry.
I AM TRYING TO REGAIN CONTROL!
I.. can smell it inside them.
(Focus.. focus..)
(Heavy laughter)
I can barely stand...
Could it be...?
Let me have a first glance.
Maybe this will buy me time?
A show is it? I'm not opposed to a theatrical extermination.
You can't hide if I break them all.
Is this the only spellcard you have?
Disgusting parasite.
Your clumsy flailing won't save you.
I will be cutting that off.
Don't slow down now, the show's still going.
I remain unimpressed.
A fragile loyalty at best.
Pathetic..
The next one is for you.
Vampiric philistine.
How did he get away?!
Time ha- HEY!
Stop that one!
Her facade wanes.
The Mistress sends her regards.
Shall I exterminate you now and spare you some indignity?
Die, monster.
You'll find I am an avid dance partner.
How revolting...
I see you're merely immitating class as well.
A disgusting imitation, hardly the mistress' equal
Her true form revealed, I always love this part.
Only three? How dull.
You're getting clumsier, you know.
Ever the slave to your impulses.
No composure, even among company..
I'll never forgive your kind.
Ignorant and self righteous.
Repent yourself and I'll end this quickly.
A pure world calls for your exterimination as well.
I aim for your heart as well.
You are a disgrace to the profession.
I'll make your burning feel like an eternity!
Cut me free!
Let me finish him!
Eliminate it's victims!
Please, have some dignity.
Eliminate it's victims!
A last meal it would seem.
A trap with no finesse.
Shall I pluck them out?
Eliminate it's victims!
Such gluttony leaves you vulnerable.
You'll be returning that.
Bloated and graceless.
Desperatly it clings to life.
